apps.localizedDescription:
uYouPlusExtra is a modified version of uYouPlus with some Extra features (requires iOS 14.0 and later).
Full infomation about uYouPlusExtra is available on Github: https://github.com/arichorn/uYouPlusExtra

Credits: Please keep the Credits if you re-up uYouPlusExtra! https://github.com/arichorn/uYouPlusExtra#credits

Attention:
- If you like the app, considering support the developers!
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality. However, this should not happen if you use TrollStore.
- Unless you're using TrollStore, deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App) simply will not work.

Known issues:
- uYou's issues: https://github.com/MiRO92/uYou-for-YouTube/issues
- uYouPlus's issues: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/issues
- uYouPlusExtra's issues: https://github.com/arichorn/uYouPlusExtra/issues
apps.name: uYouPlusExtra
apps.versionDescription:
RELEASE F1: (June 30th 2023)

- Updated YouTube from v18.21.3 to v18.25.1
- Added YTVersionSpoofer Tweak
  - this tweak gives you up to 125+ versions to choose from. It can be used to fix LowContrastMode or other tweaks, this can be found in Settings > uYouPlus > Miscellaneous
- Updated “Hide Search Ads”
  - can now block “Download App” Ads
- Updated YTNoModernUI (arichorn)
  - Replaced “16.42.3” with “17.11.2” as the default YouTube Version (reason: this was the only way to fix the overflow menu)
- Updated LowContrastMode (arichorn)
  - improvements related to text and buttons
- Fixed OLED Dark Mode
  - fixed an issue where it wasn’t working in v18.15.1+ versions
- Updated Submodules
  - iSponsorBlock v1.2
    - Fixed Cancel Button & Notification Button
    - Bug Fixes (etc)
  - YTUHD v1.4
    - VP9 Improvements
- Re-added DontEatMyContent Tweak (v1.0.10)
  - Tweak has returned! It can be found in Settings > DontEatMyContent

note: AutoFullscreen has been removed in uYouPlus since uYou 3.0 has implemented it.

apps.localizedDescription:
BHTwitter is a modified version of Twitter with many additional features.
 Full infomation about BHTwitter is available on Github: https://github.com/BandarHL/BHTwitter
apps.name: BHTwitter
apps.versionDescription:
What's new in the 3.9.1 update:
- Add a new option to force Twitter to always use the following page.
